description.part1: Cyggnus was founded by Leonardo Kotlarenko and Leonardo Kleimpaul;
description.part2: Our aim is to create fun and useful open source applications.

newUserDesc2.part1: Use your collection by providing your

description.part1: Create a new random deck with your owned collection cards!
description.part2: Sync your Marvel Snap Zone account username to generate a new completely random deck with cards from your snap collection.
